DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Binodenoson Assessing Cardiac Ischemia
DOC.criteria: Able understand sign inform consent form . Women childbearing potential . Very low likelihood coronary artery disease ( American Heart Association American College Cardiology standard ) . Documented history acute myocardial infarction within 30 day . Percutaneous coronary intervention coronary bypass graft surgery within 3 year , unless typical atypical anginal symptom present . Reactive airway disease contraindication preclude patient receive adenosine . Previous heart transplant list receive heart transplant . Cardiomyopathy ( idiopathic dilate , restrictive , hypertrophic ) . History hemodynamically significant supraventricular tachycardia sustain ventricular tachycardia . Presence second thirddegree AV block ( absence permanent pacemaker ) . Left ventricular ejection fraction great 35 % , know prior first imaging procedure . Presence advance heart failure , New York Heart Association Class IV . History vasospastic/Prinzmetal angina . Active ( treatment ) cancer ( except skin cancer ) . Inability discontinue antianginal medication , AggrenoxÂ® , dipyridamole , xanthinecontaining drug food ( include caffeine ) require prior imaging procedure . Previous participation study binodenoson . Any physical psychosocial condition , base Investigator 's judgment , would prevent patient complete study .
